Name: Disney•Pixar Cars
About the game: In this video game adaptation of Disney•Pixar's Cars, you begin as Lightning McQueen, a rookie racecar looking to win fame and fortune at the Piston Cup Championship. A racing adventure game with ten playable characters from the film, Cars offers more than 30 races and mini-games through open environments. The game includes voice talent from the movie, so listen for moral lessons from Larry the Cable Guy and comic relief from Cheech Marin.
Meta Title: Disney•Pixar Cars: Feb 24, 2015, Beenox and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Disney•Pixar Cars? Check out the release date (Feb 24, 2015), developer insights from Beenox, and a complete game summary.
